channel.title: Simples on Blake Ruprecht
channel.description: Recent content in Simples on Blake Ruprecht

item.title: /simple
item.description: (still a WIP, feedback much appreciated) Simple living is natural, easy, frugal, spiritual, sustainable, economical, healthy, fun, c onnected, and anarchist. All of the great teachers of the world have advocated for simple l iving: Pooh Bear, Hobbes (not Calvin), dogs & cats, Baloo, all trees, Uncle Iroh, Lao Tzu, the Lorax. Seriously, who doesn’t want to live like a dog? Fun Quotes “Keep it simple, stupid!” “If minimum wasn’t good enough, it wouldn’t be the minimum” -Col.
